before the coronavirus hit, muna nur farah had started to hate her husband. he’d slink into their home in the somali capital mogadishu at 3:00am with empty pockets, his money squandered on the narcotic leaf khat.  abdi sheikh
reports.  https://t.co/u0jgceooir https://t.co/cf6sxrfva8

to curb coronavirus, somalia’s government banned international flights, depriving men like farah’s husband of khat.
“this week every day, he brings home money, vegetables, mangoes, meat, food,” said farah. “i love him now. life is superb.” https://t.co/sq0ulvnrt7
